thread.title: Longest flight in the world touches down in Auckland - Yahoo New Zealand
thread.title_full: Longest flight in the world touches down in Auckland - Yahoo New Zealand

author: Yahoo
title: Longest flight in the world touches down in Auckland - Yahoo New Zealand
text:
Share Longest flight in the world touches down in Auckland - Yahoo New Zealand Qatar Airways' flight QR920 has arrived in Auckland after crossing ten times zones without stopping from Doha in the Middle East. Close Qatar Airways' Auckland-Doha flight lands in Auckland UP NEXT VIDEO Qatar Airways' Auckland-Doha flight lands in Auckland. Source: One News Qatar Airways' Auckland-Doha flight lands in Auckland 
It's billed as the longest commercial passenger flight in the world and arrived slightly ahead of its scheduled arrival time at Auckland International Airport. 
The route launched with a 777-200LR aircraft on a daily service that will add $198 million annually to the New Zealand economy, the airport said. The airline sent live updates to fans across the world of the Auckland-Doha flight. Photos: Snapchat/Qatar-Airways — Gerri Ndoro (@gerri50) February 5, 2017 
With a journey measuring in at 342km longer than that of its Gulf rival, QR920 left Doha's Hamad Airport on Sunday (NZT). 
The Qatar flight received a traditional water cannon welcome as it arrived in Auckland 15 minutes earlier than anticipated. An infograph details the new Auckland-Doha service. Photo: Qatar Airways 
The route covers 14,535km and the flight takes as long as 17 hours 45 minutes when flying into prevailing jet streams to Doha. 
It's slightly longer than the service operated by Emirates to Auckland from Dubai. 
RELATED: World's longest flight takes off for Auckland from Doha 
The return flight to Doha leaves Auckland Airport at 2.40pm. 
Air India's Delhi-San Francisco flight is the world's longest by distance, but according to the "Great Circle" route Doha and Auckland are further apart on the surface of the Earth. Close Longest flight in the world lands in Auckland UP NEXT VIDEO Qatar flight welcomed to Auckland Airpoort. Source: Twitter/Toko Longest flight in the world lands in Auckland 
People took to Twitter to share the adventure: Touchdown! Welcome to @qatarairways flight QR920, landed at 07:20 from @HIAQatar ! pic.twitter.com/OQDgI5pE2i — Auckland Airport (@AKL_Airport) February 5, 2017 إنجاز جديد @qatarairways أول رحلة من الدوحة إلى اوكلاند، أطول رحلة في العالم،مدتها إلى ١٦:١٠ ساعة، ورحلة العودة تستغرق ١٧:٣٠ ساعة pic.twitter.com/7MJyN1aI18
